page.title: 16Childrens' Activities
page.content: Hednesford has many clubs for children. Dance troops and jazz bands are very popular. The Bobby Dazzlers in their red and black uniforms have won many dance competitions. The Hednesford Sapphires are a very well known marching jazz band and have won all over the country. The ex-servicemen's bowling club is for all ages and travels to other greens playing tournaments. The Boys Brigade is very well supported. We meet on Wednesdays, and after a short service and inspection we do badge work and play games. We also have a football team. The Wado Ryu karate club meets on Mondays. We do self defence and the Japanese way of fighting. There are various movements called katas, coloured belts show the stage you have reached. Our school runs clubs for Badminton, gymnastics, football etc.
